headlines.description: Utah took advantage of a disastrous start by BYU in the Royal Purple Las Vegas Bowl, scoring five first-quarter touchdowns on turnovers before holding on for a 35-28 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Utah withstands BYU after quick 35-0 lead

events.name: Arizona Wildcats at New Mexico Lobos

headlines.description: Arizona held off pesky New Mexico 45-37 on Saturday in a wild Gildan New Mexico Bowl that saw QB Anu Solomon totals three touchdowns.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arizona withstands late rally from New Mexico

events.name: Ohio Bobcats at Appalachian State Mountaineers

headlines.description: Zach Matics's 23-yard field goal on the final play lifted Appalachian State to a 31-29 victory over Ohio on Saturday night in the Raycom Media Camellia Bowl.

video.headline: Appalachian State wins first bowl game as time expires

headlines.shortLinkText: Matics' 23-yard FG gives App State walkoff win

events.name: San Jose State Spartans at Georgia State Panthers

headlines.description: Kenny Potter scored on a 42-yard run and threw a 1-yard touchdown pass to Josh Oliver in San Jose State's 27-16 comeback victory over Georgia State on Saturday night in the inaugural Cure Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: SJSU rallies to beat Georgia State in Cure Bowl

events.name: Arkansas State Red Wolves at Louisiana Tech Bulldogs

headlines.description: Kenneth Dixon had 215 yards from scrimmage and scored four times to become the NCAA's career touchdowns leader, and Louisiana Tech beat Arkansas State 47-28 in the New Orleans Bowl on Saturday ni
headlines.shortLinkText: Dixon sets TD mark, La. Tech beats ASU, 47-28 in N.O. Bowl
